summary: Comprehensive E2E testing completed for AfroVending marketplace. All backend API tests (29/29) passed. All frontend UI tests passed including homepage, navigation, products, services, cart, checkout, login, registration, vendor dashboard, pricing, and category pages.
critical_code_review_comments: Server.py line 478-479: Duplicate 'return vendors' statement - cosmetic issue
Consider adding indexes on MongoDB collections for category_id, vendor_id for better query performance at scale
seed_data_creation: Database already seeded with categories, vendor user, admin user, products, and services
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major flows tested and working: Homepage with featured products/services/vendors, Navigation dropdowns (Products, Services, Countries), Products listing with filters (category, country, price, sort), Product detail page with Add to Cart, Services listing with filters, Service detail page with booking calendar, User login/registration, Cart functionality, Checkout flow with Stripe integration, Vendor dashboard, Pricing page with subscription tiers, Category landing pages. Backend APIs all returning expected responses with proper authentication handling.

homepage.details: Hero section, featured products (8), vendors (1), categories, trust badges

navigation.details: Products dropdown, Services dropdown, Countries dropdown, Vendors link, Pricing link

products_page.details: 8 products displayed, filters (category, country, price, sort), grid/list view toggle

product_detail.details: Product info, price, Add to Cart, Buy Now, vendor info, related products

services_page.details: 7 services displayed, filters (category, location type), Book Now buttons

service_detail.details: Service info, calendar booking, provider info, reviews section

authentication.details: Email/password login, Google OAuth button, registration with role selection

cart.details: Add to cart, quantity controls, remove item, cart total, checkout button

checkout.details: Shipping form, country select, order summary, Stripe integration ready

vendor_dashboard.details: Stats cards (Orders, Bookings, Revenue), Recent Orders, Recent Bookings

pricing_page.details: 4 subscription tiers (Starter, Growth, Pro, Enterprise) with features

category_landing.details: Fashion category page with hero, features, popular tags, products
